input.sentences: the awards ceremony was on a monday .
we gave awards to each participant in the program .
these people all had a success story in them .
they came from all walks of life .
at the end we took a group photo .
output.sentences: On Monday night, there was an awards ceremony.
Participants who successfully completed the program received awards for their hard work.
Those who presented people with awards shared their stories with the crowd and recognized them for their successes.
Program participants who received awards came from all walks of life.
The program commemorated the evening by taking a group photo after the ceremony.
